alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:36AM MST until March 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm Exiting the Area Today... .Snow will continue across much of the area early this morning, but then the snow will be ending from southwest to northeast. By early afternoon, most of the accumulating snow will will have moved east of the Black Hills. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County, Southern Campbell County, Western Crook County and the Weston County Plains. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston
